title: Lovely Little Coffee Shop
description: Go to 123 Main St. It has great tasting coffee and great wifi connection. The service is great. It is great place to get everything you need done.

title: Newest Coffee Shop
description: This coffee has a new one you try every month that they make on site. Very fancy. Get to try new coffee every month so it's not the same old same old.

title: Gotta give Bloom some love this year
description: Great album to drown everything and everyone out to code. Ultimate focuser.

title: W3Schools for the win, every time!
description: This site is simple documentation for a lot of languages. But I mainly use it for all things Javascript.

title: Styling for Handlebars
description: You'll need to create a public folder and store another folder called css in it to create style.css file. But wait until you get to React. It will make handlebars obsolete.

title: Best burgers in town
description: Go to 345 N Main St. They have the best burgers. The owner who runs things is a local, so support local business while you fuel up to write more code.

title: Best NAS recommendation
description: Honestly, just look at how much storage you use now. Then times that by four. Then get that much storage for your NAS.

title: Vision Pro Update
description: The Vision Pro is quite expensive. Not a lot of developers yet building on this platform. Nervous for the longevity of this production line.

title: Arc Browser
description: The Arc Browser is up and coming. Learn it before it becomes mainstream and be ahead of the curve.

title: How to get a Job in the Market
description: If you can't find a job as a developer, find a small company.

title: Tech adjacent jobs
description: If you're stuck looking for a developer job, try  to work in a tech adjacent job.

title: New Resource Alert!
description: Look into HackerWars to test your leetcode ways.
